Package org.purewidgets.client.widgets

Class Summary
PdButton A PdButton represents an action button that can by "clicked".
PdCheckin A PdCheckin represents an check-in widget that reacts to users' check-ins.
PdDownload A PdDownload represents an file or URL that can be downloaded or opened in a browser.
PdListBox A widget that presents a list of choices to the user.
PdTagCloud The tag cloud widget is a visual representation of a tag cloud.
PdTextBox The PdTextBox widget shows a graphical textbox with a caption (and reference code) inside.
PdUpload A PdUpload is a widget that allows users to upload files to the application.
PdWidget A PdWidget represents the base class for the client side version of a PuReWidgets widget.
ReferenceCodeFormatter Helper class to format the reference codes on widgets.
 

Enum Summary
PdTagCloud.ORDER Possible ordering of tags in the tag cloud.
